sentences.sContent: ‘Okay, so maybe I was a little bit scared,’ Jenny admitted.
sentences.sCn: “行了，也许我是有点害怕。”珍妮承认道。

sentences.sContent: I must admit , I didn’t actually do anything to help her.
sentences.sCn: 我必须承认，实际上我并没有帮她什么忙。

sentences.sContent: Admit it! I’m right, aren’t I?

remMethod.val: ad + mit(送) → 能送进去 → 准许…进入

words.tran: 可容许的；可采纳的；可接受的
承认；入场费；进入许可；坦白；录用

trans.tranCn: 承认； 接纳， 准许…进入
trans.tranOther: to agree unwillingly that something is true or that someone else is right
